help-file.title: "RAISE SHADOW"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necrolyte has a suitable corpse at his feet, this spell will force the soul of the slain back into their body, transforming them into a shadow. The shadow is a translucent being that attacks the enemy with the power of its mind.
